TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ImportCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class ImportCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 匯入 控制項 (或其他用做 控制項的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項) 的描述檔，以便讓使用者可以將控制項加入具有預先定義之設定的 Web 網頁。

span.span: Imports a description file for a control (or other ASP.NET server control used as a control), so that users can add the control to a Web page with pre-defined settings.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓使用者匯入描述設定的描述檔案控制項或使用者想要加入的伺服器控制項區域。The control enables users to import a description file that describes settings on a control or server control that a user wants to add to a zone. 在使用者匯入描述檔案之後,檔案中參考的控制項就會出現內控制項，以及使用者可以將控制項加入至頁面。After a user imports a description file, the control referenced in the file appears within the control, and a user can add the control to the page. 描述檔案不是控制項本身相同。The description file is not the same as the control itself. 它是結尾的 XML 檔案。Web 組件擴充功能和包含名稱/值組-大部分屬性值，描述控制項的狀態。It is an XML file that ends with a .WebPart extension and contains name/value pairs--mostly property values--that describe the state of the control. 本主題中所述，描述檔案根據指定的 XML 格式，建立[Web 組件控制項的說明檔案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8)。The description file is created according to a specified XML format, as described in the topic [Web Parts Control Description Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8). 至於說明檔所參考的控制項，可以編譯成組件，或它可以是.ascx 檔案中定義的使用者控制項。As for the control that the description file refers to, it can either be compiled into an assembly, or it can be a user control defined in an .ascx file. 在任一情況下，裝載嘗試匯入控制項的頁面的 Web 伺服器上必須有匯入的描述檔中參考的控制項。In either case, the control referenced in an imported description file must exist on the Web server that hosts the page that is attempting to import the control. 描述檔案的參考名稱和組件 （或檔案） 包含控制項的控制項，並描述檔案包含會影響控制項的屬性值、 外觀和行為的設定。The description file references the control name and the assembly (or file) that contains the control, and the description file contains settings that affect the control's property values, appearance, and behavior. 控制項可讓使用者在控制項上的設定共用。The control enables users to share settings on controls. 為複雜控制項可以有許多屬性和設定。A complex control can have many properties and settings. 例如，在典型的內部網路內的網站的大型公司自訂控制項可能會包含保留使用者的環境，例如其資料庫連線、 部門的詳細資訊，以及其他特定值的屬性數目。For example, in a typical intranet site within a large company, a custom control might contain a number of properties that hold values specific to the users' environment, such as their database connections, departmental information, and so on. 控制項也可能包含一些會影響其外觀的屬性。The control might also contain a number of properties that affect its appearance. 一位使用者無法個人化特定站台上的控制項和取得正常運作，匯出描述檔案的控制項，且然後與其他使用者，使用者可以匯入的完整設定的控制項加入其他內部網路檔案共用描述檔案他們可以個人化的站台。One user could personalize the control on a particular site and get it working properly, export a description file for the control, and then share the description file with other users, who could import the file to add the fully configured control to other intranet sites that they are allowed to personalize. 只要 Web 伺服器裝載其站台上有編譯的組件或使用者控制項檔案，包含控制項，使用者可以將控制項加入至其他網站。As long as the compiled assembly or user control file containing the control exists on the Web server that is hosting their site, users can add the control to other Web sites. 依據使用者匯入描述檔案 （並因此其相關聯的伺服器控制） 到網頁的機制是網頁開發人員必須新增到網頁的控制項。The mechanism by which users import a description file (and hence its associated server control) into a Web page is the control, which a page developer must add to a Web page. 當使用者切換至目錄的顯示模式，頁面控制項就會出現，而且使用者可以使用者瀏覽至這個控制項。他們想要匯入對應加入伺服器控制項的網頁組件描述檔。When a user switches the page to catalog display mode, the control appears, and the user can user this control to browse to the .WebPart description file corresponding to the server control they want to import. 下列 UI 和所提供的指示控制項，使用者就可以將所需的伺服器控制項加入至網頁的外觀和完整匯入的 description 檔案中設定所指定的屬性。Following the UI and instructions provided by the control, a user is able to add the desired server control into the Web page, with its appearance and properties fully configured as specified in the imported description file. 之前控制項的說明檔可以匯入，所以使用者必須先建立 （匯出） 檔案會根據現有控制項。Before a control's description file can be imported, a user must first create (export) the file based on an existing control. 描述檔案可以匯出控制項必須符合下列條件：A description file can be exported for a control if the following conditions are met: - 控制項有標示了`Personalizable`屬性。The control has properties marked with the `Personalizable` attribute. - Web.config 檔案具有`enableExport`屬性值設定為`true`上``項目。The Web.config file has the `enableExport` attribute value set to `true` on the `` element. - 開發人員設定的值屬性的預設值以外的值在控制項上，而且禁止匯出。A developer sets the value of the property on the control to a value other than the default value of , which prohibits export. 如果屬性值設定為，任何屬性，其中包含參數`Personalizable`屬性不會匯出時使用者會將匯出的描述檔案。If the property value is set to , any property that contains an parameter with a `Personalizable` attribute is not exported when a user exports a description file. 這可讓控制項開發人員若要避免敏感性資料，例如連接字串，在某些情況下匯出。This enables control developers to prevent sensitive data, such as connection strings, from being exported in certain situations. 使用者可以匯出已啟用匯出，即可匯出動詞命令的控制項，然後遵循指示，儲存的動詞命令功能表中出現的控制項。Web 組件控制項的說明檔案。A user can export a control that has been enabled for export by clicking the export verb that appears in the verbs menu of the control, and following the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 其他使用者，可以再匯入此檔案，以設定自己的控制項執行個體。Other users can then import this file to configure their own instances of the control. 類別包含數個屬性。The class contains several properties. 屬性包含的使用者指示的文字，在瀏覽來尋找說明檔案時。The property contains text with instructions for users when they browse to locate the description file. 屬性包含文字做為匯入之控制項的標籤，出現於控制項。The property contains text that serves as a label for the imported control as it appears within the control. 包含控制項說明匯入時，發生錯誤時顯示的文字。The contains text that is displayed if an error occurs when a control description is being imported. 屬性會覆寫基底屬性，若要指派的預設標題控制如果開發人員不會指派一個標題。The property overrides the base property to assign a default title for an control if the developer does not assign a title. 屬性包含描述檔案中上, 傳的使用者按一下按鈕的文字和屬性包含上傳程序的指示。The property contains the text for the button that the user clicks to upload the description file, and the property contains the instructions for the upload process. 類別也包含數個唯一的方法。The class also contains several unique methods. 方法擷取物件給每個在目錄中，可讓控制項控制項來顯示每個伺服器控制項的相關資訊，而不需要建立它的執行個體。The method retrieves a object for each control in the catalog, which enables an control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of it. 方法取得的特定執行個體傳遞給方法的描述為基礎的控制項。The method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. 有一些與使用相關聯的固有風險控制項。There are some inherent risks associated with using the control. 其中一個範例是 Web 應用程式匯入惡意的資料，透過用來匯入的 description 檔案中的可能性。One example is the possibility of importing malicious data into your Web application through the description files used for importing. 如果有人將惡意程式碼置於做為 description 檔案中的字串屬性的值，然後該指令碼無法可能必須執行時使用者匯入描述檔案，並將參考的伺服器控制項加入至 Web 網頁。If someone has placed malicious script code as the value of a string property in the description file, then that script could potentially be executed when a user imports the description file and adds the referenced server control to a Web page. 匯入具有惡意資料描述檔案的風險降到最低，沒有字串型別屬性的伺服器控制項一律應編碼屬性資料。To minimize the risk of importing description files with malicious data, server controls that have string-typed properties should always encode the property data. 另一個風險牽涉到透過描述檔案匯入類型 (請參閱[Web 組件控制項的說明檔案](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8))。Another risk involves importing types through description files (see [Web Parts Control Description Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/480992e4-8fc7-43f8-bffc-ae97bbdfe5b8)). 惡意使用者可以提交要求以載入至許多組件，並產生過多所耗用的記憶體數量。A malicious user could submit requests to load many assemblies into the , resulting in an excessive amount of memory being consumed. 若要避免匯入相關聯的風險，您可以完全停用此功能不使用 匯入功能或控制項。To avoid the risks associated with import, you can disable the feature altogether by not using the import feature or the control. 您也可以限制哪些使用者有權存取控制項。Or you can limit what users have access to the control. 您無法執行這項操作以程式設計的方式，使用角色管理 (請參閱[管理授權使用角色](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01954ce4-39a2-487f-8153-a69f6f6f3195))。You could do this programmatically, using role management (see [Managing Authorization Using Roles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01954ce4-39a2-487f-8153-a69f6f6f3195)). 比方說，當網頁載入時，您無法測試以檢查使用者是否為特定角色，例如系統管理員角色。For instance, when the page loads, you could test to see whether a user is in a certain role, such as the administrator role. 如果使用者是在角色中，您無法以程式設計方式加入控制該使用者的頁面。If the user is in the role, you could programmatically add the control to the page for that user. 您也可以使用宣告式方法來限制一組可讓使用者控制項。You could also use a declarative approach to limit the set of users that can use the control. 中包含的類別目錄網頁，您無法放置兩個控制項： 一個用於可以匯入的使用者，一個的人員無法。Within your web page that contains a catalog, you could place two controls: one for users who can import, and one for those who cannot. 會包含可以匯入的使用者的區域控制項。The zone for users who can import would contain the control. 區域本身無法放在控制項，可讓您限制區域中控制項的使用，僅限所驗證的使用者或您指定的角色。The zone itself could be placed inside of a control, which would enable you to limit use of the control in the zone to only those authenticated users or roles that you specify. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用控制以宣告方式並以程式設計方式在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively and programmatically on a Web page. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 網頁包含控制項和控制項。A Web page that contains a control and an control. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 您應該將下列原始程式碼放在檔案並將其命名 Displaymodemenucs.ascx 或 Displaymodemenuvb.ascx （依據哪一種語言使用）。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在頁面的頂端是兩個`register`指示詞，其中一個使用者控制項，一個用於編譯過的元件包含兩個自訂控制項。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 請注意此頁面具有的宣告式參考控制項，巢狀方式置於適當的宣告式元素的階層。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 另請注意，會以宣告方式在指派數個屬性值``項目。Notice also that several property values are assigned declaratively on the `` element. 此外，`Button1_Click`方法上更新的屬性值的數字控制項。Also, the `Button1_Click` method updates a number of property values on the control. 在頁面控制項、 兩個自訂控制項所宣告。In the page's control, the two custom controls are declared. ``控制項有`exportmode="all"`在其上的屬性。The `` control has an `exportmode="all"` attribute on it. 若要讓匯出的控制項，則會匯入的其他使用者想要匯入使用描述檔案的控制項的描述檔案的使用者都需要此屬性。This attribute is required to enable users to export a description file for the control, which can then be imported by other users who wish to import the control using the description file. > [!NOTE] > 若要啟用 Web 組件應用程式匯出的描述檔案的使用者控制項，您也必須啟用 Web 應用程式中的匯出功能，藉由新增`enableExport="true"`屬性``元素 (的子系``元素) 的 Web.config 檔案中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 預設為停用匯出，因此如果您未啟用匯出您的應用程式，編輯 Web.config 檔案，並且立即執行它的作業。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是兩個的原始程式碼控制項。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 請注意，這些控制項的某些屬性會標記為`WebBrowsable`屬性。Notice that some properties on these controls are marked with the `WebBrowsable` attribute. 這可讓動態產生使用者編輯這些屬性，當控制項處於編輯模式時的使用者介面 (UI) 控制項。This enables the control to dynamically generate the user interface (UI) for a user to edit those properties when the controls are in edit mode. 屬性也會標示`WebDisplayName`屬性，以指定的編輯 UI 中的每個控制項旁出現的標籤文字。The properties are also marked with a `WebDisplayName` attribute, to specify the text of the label that appears next to each control in the editing UI. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 自訂控制項稱為`TextDisplayWebPart`參考在網頁上與``項目。The custom control called `TextDisplayWebPart` is referenced on the Web page with an `` element. 其他控制項，稱為`UserInfoWebPart`，也已經宣告在網頁上一開始，但您將會移除更新版本，才能示範匯入一個控制項的描述檔案的能力。The other control, called `UserInfoWebPart`, is also declared on the Web page initially, though you will remove it later to demonstrate the ability to import a description file for a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 現在，執行程式碼範例。Now run the code example. 載入網頁瀏覽器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一個步驟是編輯`UserInfoWebPart`控制項。The first step is to edit the `UserInfoWebPart` control. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**編輯**若要將頁面切換至編輯模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Edit** to switch the page to edit mode. 按一下的動詞命令功能表`UserInfoWebPart`控制項 （標題列中的向下箭頭），然後再按一下**編輯**。Click the verbs menu of the `UserInfoWebPart` control (the downward arrow in the title bar), and then click **Edit**. 數個編輯控制項的編輯 UI 出現時，請參閱下文`UserInfoWebPart`控制項可讓您編輯其欄位的值。When the editing UI appears, several editing controls appear below the `UserInfoWebPart` control that you can use to edit its field values. 編輯某些欄位，請按一下**確定**，然後使用**顯示模式**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式的下拉式清單。Edit some fields, click **OK**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down to return the page to browse mode. 第二個步驟是匯出。Web 組件描述檔`UserInfoWebPart`控制項。The second step is to export a .WebPart description file for the `UserInfoWebPart` control. 按一下 （標題列中向下箭號表示），在自訂控制項上的動詞命令功能表，然後按一下**匯出**。Click the verbs menu on the custom control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 請依照下列指示，儲存。Web 組件控制項的說明檔案。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 現在關閉網頁上，並編輯網頁原始檔編輯器中。Now close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 刪除``控制宣告項目，然後儲存並關閉檔案。Delete the `` control declaration element, then save and close the file. (您在進行此步驟，以模擬的使用者還沒有`UserInfoWebPart`控制，讓您可以將控制項匯入至頁面)。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have the `UserInfoWebPart` control, so you can import the control to the page). 載入網頁瀏覽器中一次。Load the Web page again in a browser. `UserInfoWebPart`控制項不應該出現，因為您已經將它移除。The `UserInfoWebPart` control should not appear, because you removed it. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**目錄**，將頁面切換至目錄模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在控制，請按一下**瀏覽**按鈕，然後瀏覽至。Web 組件檔案所建立，然後按一下 [**上傳**] 按鈕。In the control, click the **Browse** button, and browse to the .WebPart file you created, then click the **Upload** button. 控制項的參考，應該會出現旁邊的核取方塊。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 選取核取方塊，然後按一下 **新增**將控制項加入至頁面。Select the check box, then click **Add** to add the control to the page. 當您在這個檢視的頁面中，按一下**更新 ImportCatalogPart**按鈕的效果，以程式設計方式更新的屬性值的數目上的頁面底部附近控制項。While you are in this view of the page, click the **Update ImportCatalogPart** button near the bottom of the page to see the effect of programmatically updating a number of property values on the control. 按一下按鈕後，觀察方式會在 UI 中變更的各種屬性。After clicking the button, observe how the various properties are changed in the UI. 最後，按一下 **關閉**結束目錄模式，傳回的頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. `UserInfoWebPart`控制項現在應該會出現在頁面中，包含先前匯出時的值。The `UserInfoWebPart` control should now appear in the page, containing the values that it had when you exported it earlier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式是預設值，則沒有建構函式宣告中類別，因此沒有特殊的工作會執行建立類別的新執行個體時。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 內部使用建構函式建立類別的執行個體。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 通常您不需要使用建構函式，以程式設計方式在自己的程式碼。Normally you will not need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控制項的用途是網頁程式開發人員將它加入至網頁以宣告方式在執行階段。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

A string that contains the text of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓使用者第一件事，它們必須正在加入匯入的控制項執行簡單的概觀： 路徑中輸入或瀏覽至檔案中提供的描述檔案位置。The property gives users a simple overview of the first thing they must do in the process of adding an imported control: provide the location of a description file, by either typing in a path or browsing to the file. 提供這個屬性的自訂值的常見原因是如果您有特殊的指示，針對使用者，例如特定的網路共用的使用者應該瀏覽來尋找說明檔。A typical reason to supply a custom value for this property is if you have special instructions for users, such as a specific network share to which they should browse to locate a description file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 如完整的程式碼和指示，才能執行此範例中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下列程式碼區段中，請注意，控制項以宣告方式設定屬性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的程式碼會覆寫繼承自基底屬性類別，以隱藏的屬性，從設計工具，並防止它受到佈景主題。The code for this property overrides the base property inherited from the class to hide the property from designers and prevent it from being affected by themes. 雖然是公用的這個屬性由設定此控制項的預設呈現的 Web 組件控制項內部使用，並不是網頁開發人員所使用。Though it is public, this property is used internally by the Web Parts control set for default rendering of this control and is not intended to be used by page developers. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供實作抽象基底方法宣告中類別。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法會傳回每個控制項的描述資訊的目錄中。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. 請注意，如果是控制項，可以有只有一個伺服器控制項類別目錄中一次，即使方法會在多個控制項一樣運作。Note that in the case of an control, there can be only one server control in the catalog at a time, even though the method would work if there were multiple controls. A物件是必要的資訊包含有關物件控制項，包括其識別碼、 將控制項，以及繼承自的幾個重要屬性的值的物件參考類別，例如和。A object is an object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法可改善效能。The method improves performance. 當建立目錄時，需要一些資訊其中的內容，包括標題、 描述、 圖示 （如果有的話） 和 id。 每個控制項When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 而不必建立要取得這項資訊，每個控制項的執行個體呼叫會建立類別目錄的區域方法，並在呼叫傳回只描述資訊的控制項，而不是執行個體控制項。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method, and the call returns only the description information for the control rather than an instance of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用網頁上的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method on a Web page. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 網頁包含控制項和控制項，以及使用的程式碼方法。A Web page that contains a control and an control, along with code that uses the method. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 您應該將下列原始程式碼放在檔案並將其命名 Displaymodemenucs.ascx 或 Displaymodemenuvb.ascx （依據哪一種語言使用）。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在頁面的頂端是兩個`register`指示詞，其中一個使用者控制項，一個用於編譯過的元件包含兩個自訂控制項。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 網頁的標記中以宣告方式參考兩個這些控制項。Both of these controls are referenced declaratively in the markup of the page. 上的宣告式參考控制項 (兩者開頭`aspSample`前置詞)，請注意，每個有`exportMode="all"`屬性新增至其中。On the declarative references to the controls (both begin with an `aspSample` prefix), note that each has an `exportMode="all"` attribute added to it. 這個屬性可讓您匯出。Web 組件的控制項，您會在中使用更新的版本逐步匯入到網頁的控制項的描述檔案。This attribute enables you to export a .WebPart description file for the control, which you will use in a later to step to import the control to a page. > [!NOTE] > 若要啟用 Web 組件應用程式匯出的描述檔案的使用者控制項，您也必須啟用 Web 應用程式中的匯出功能，藉由新增`enableExport="true"`屬性``元素 (的子系``元素) 的 Web.config 檔案中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 預設為停用匯出，因此如果您未啟用匯出您的應用程式，編輯 Web.config 檔案，並且立即執行它的作業。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. 網頁也具有宣告式參考控制項，巢狀方式置於適當的宣告式元素的階層。The Web page also has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 內的程式碼呼叫方法`Button1_Click`方法。The method is called within the code for the `Button1_Click` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/ImportCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/ImportCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是兩個的原始程式碼控制項。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). close the file. （您進行此步驟，以模擬還沒有這些控制項，讓您可以將控制項匯入至頁面的使用者）。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have these controls, so you can import the controls to the page). 載入網頁瀏覽器中一次。Load 控制項的參考，應該會出現旁邊的核取方塊。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 選取核取方塊，然後按一下 **新增**將控制項加入至頁面。Select the check box, then click **Add** to add the control to the page. 用來存取說明的詳細資訊，此方法找到中`Button1_Click`網頁的來源，方法是方法。The method used to access the description details, found in the `Button1_Click` method of the page source, is the method. 在按鈕下方的標籤會顯示此控制項的相關基本詳細資料。A label below the button displays basic details about the control. 新增之後的第一個控制項，重複此程序將第二個控制項加入頁面。After adding the first control, repeat the process to add the second control to the page. 最後，按一下 **關閉**結束目錄模式，傳回的頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. 兩個自訂控制項現在應該會出現在頁面中，其中包含您稍早匯出的說明檔案時所具有的值。Both custom controls should now appear in the page, containing the values they had when you exported description files earlier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳回的參考控制其描述詳細資料相符的值物件傳遞至方法。The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 一般而言，這個方法會搭配方法，用來擷取類別目錄中的控制項的描述。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of controls in the catalog. 個別控制項可以再擷取或操作所需藉由傳遞個別物件加入至方法。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用網頁上的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method on a Web page. 此範例包含四個部分：The example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 網頁包含控制項和控制項，以及使用的程式碼方法。A Web page that contains a control and an control, along with code that uses the method. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 當您載入瀏覽器中的，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 您應該將下列原始程式碼放在檔案並將其命名 Displaymodemenucs.ascx 或 Displaymodemenuvb.ascx （依據哪一種語言使用）。You should place the following source code in a file and name it Displaymodemenucs.ascx or Displaymodemenuvb.ascx (depending on which language you are using). 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是 Web 網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在頁面的頂端是兩個`register`指示詞，其中一個使用者控制項，一個用於編譯過的元件包含兩個自訂控制項。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 網頁的標記中以宣告方式參考兩個這些控制項。Both of these controls are referenced declaratively in the markup of the page. 上的宣告式參考控制項 (兩者開頭`aspSample`前置詞)，請注意，每個有`exportMode="all"`屬性新增至其中。On the declarative references to the controls (both begin with an `aspSample` prefix), note that each has an `exportMode="all"` attribute added to it. 這個屬性可讓您匯出。Web 組件的控制項，您會在中使用更新的版本逐步匯入到網頁的控制項的描述檔案。This attribute enables you to export a .WebPart description file for the control, which you will use in a later to step to import the control to a page. > [!NOTE] > 若要啟用 Web 組件應用程式匯出的描述檔案的使用者控制項，您也必須啟用 Web 應用程式中的匯出功能，藉由新增`enableExport="true"`屬性``元素 (的子系``元素) 的 Web.config 檔案中。To enable users of a Web Parts application to export a description file for controls, you must also enable the export feature in the Web application by adding an `enableExport="true"` attribute to the `` element (which is a child of the `` element) in the Web.config file. 預設為停用匯出，因此如果您未啟用匯出您的應用程式，編輯 Web.config 檔案，並且立即執行它的作業。Export is disabled by default, so if you have not yet enabled export for your application, edit the Web.config file and do it now. 網頁也具有宣告式參考控制項，巢狀方式置於適當的宣告式元素的階層。The Web page also has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements. 內的程式碼呼叫方法`Button2_Click`方法。The method is called within the code for the `Button2_Click` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/ImportCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/ImportCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是兩個的原始程式碼控制項。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。This code example uses dynamic compilation. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 現在，執行程式碼範例。Now run the code example. 載入網頁瀏覽器中。Load the Web page in a browser. 第一個步驟是匯出。每個 web 組件描述檔控制項 (如`TextDisplayWebPart`和`UserInfoWebPart`控制項)。The first step is export a .WebPart description file for each control (for the `TextDisplayWebPart` and for the `UserInfoWebPart` control). 針對每個控制項中，按一下 動詞命令功能表 （標題列中向下箭號表示），在控制項上的，按一下**匯出**。For each control, click the verbs menu on the control (represented by the downward arrow in the title bar), and click **Export**. 請依照下列指示，儲存。Web 組件控制項的說明檔案。Follow the instructions to save a .WebPart description file for the control. 您已匯出的每個控制項的描述檔案之後，關閉網頁，並編輯網頁原始檔編輯器中。After you have exported a description file for each control, close the Web page, and edit the page source in an editor. 刪除``和``控制宣告項目，然後儲存並關閉檔案。Delete the `` and the `` control declaration elements, then save and close the file. （您進行此步驟，以模擬還沒有這些控制項，讓您可以將控制項匯入至頁面的使用者）。(You are doing this step to simulate a user who does not yet have these controls, so you can import the controls to the page). 載入網頁瀏覽器中一次。Load the Web page again in a browser. 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**目錄**，將頁面切換至目錄模式。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Catalog** to switch the page to catalog mode. 在控制，請按一下**瀏覽**按鈕，瀏覽至。選取其中一個，您所建立的 web 組件檔案，然後按一下 [**上傳**] 按鈕。In the control, click the **Browse** button, browse to the .WebPart files you created, select one, then click the **Upload** button. 控制項的參考，應該會出現旁邊的核取方塊。A reference to the control should appear with a check box next to it. 既然已上傳控制項說明控制，請按一下**使用 GetWebPart**靠近頁面底部的按鈕。Now that the control description is uploaded to the control, click the **Use GetWebPart** button near the bottom of the page. 這將示範呼叫的效果方法並傳遞給它中目前載入的控制項描述控制項。This will demonstrate the effect of calling the method and passing to it the control description currently loaded in the control. 請注意，關聯的伺服器控制項加入立即網頁，使用者不需按**新增** 按鈕。Note that the associated server control is added immediately to the Web page, without the user having to click the **Add** button. 方法，在中，稱為`Button2_Click`網頁的來源，方法會傳回中載入的目前描述相關聯的控制項控制項。The method, which is called in the `Button2_Click` method of the page source, returns the control associated with the current description that is loaded in the control. 下一步呼叫方法時，而控制項直接加入至頁面。Next the method is called, and the control is directly added to the page. 這示範了如何加入控制項以程式設計方式從控制項不需要使用者介入。This demonstrates how to add a control programmatically from the control without user intervention. 新增之後的第一個控制項，重複此程序將第二個控制項加入頁面。After adding the first control, repeat the process to add the second control to the page. 最後，按一下 **關閉**結束目錄模式，傳回的頁面，即可瀏覽模式。Finally, click **Close** to exit catalog mode and return the page to browse mode. 兩個自訂控制項現在應該會出現在頁面中，其中包含您稍早匯出的說明檔案時所具有的值。Both custom controls should now appear in the page, containing the values they had when you exported description files earlier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值會顯示在標題列控制控制項時顯示在類別目錄的模式。The property value is displayed in the title bar of an control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 控制項在頁面中宣告時，您可以透過設定屬性的值`Title`屬性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果您未提供標題的值，特定文化特性的預設值用來描述此控制項可讓使用者編輯的屬性類型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 如完整的程式碼和指示，才能執行此範例中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下列程式碼區段中，請注意，控制項以宣告方式設定屬性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#2)] 在這段程式碼，以程式設計的方式指派屬性值。In this section of code, the property value is assigned programmatically. [!code-csharp[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/CS/ImportCatalogPartOverviewCS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_ImportCatalogPart_Overview/VB/ImportCatalogPartOverviewVB.aspx#3)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項以選取**目錄模式**並將頁面切換至 類別目錄的模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to select **Catalog Mode** and switch the page to catalog mode. 類別目錄的模式和上傳的說明檔案中的網頁，請注意各種使用者介面 (UI) 中顯示的文字字串的控制項。With the page in catalog mode and the description file uploaded, note the various text strings displayed in the user interface (UI) for the control. 如果您按一下**上傳描述檔案**變更 按鈕，在 UI 中屬性的文字，包括文字屬性。If you click the **Upload Description File** button, the text for several of the properties in the UI is changed, including the text for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的文字啟動上傳程序的控制項。The property provides the text for the control that initiates the upload process. 如果這個屬性，或指派自訂文字屬性，文字應該進行清除使用者上傳的描述檔案。If you assign custom text to this property, or to the property, the text should make clear that the user is uploading a description file. 文字不應該假設，或暗示上傳程序實際上控制項本身上傳。The text should not say or imply that the upload process is actually uploading the control itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 如完整的程式碼和指示，才能執行此範例中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下列程式碼區段中，請注意，控制項以宣告方式設定屬性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control. summary.span: 取得或設定訊息文字，告訴使用者如何上載描述檔。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the message that tells the user how to upload a description file.

value.span: 用來做為使用者上載描述檔之指示的字串。

span.span: A string that is used as instructions for the user to upload a description file.

value.span: 預設值是 Web 組件控制集所提供的文化特性字串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供簡短的句子或片語的使用者，通知他們按一下按鈕，即可上傳描述檔案的指示。The property provides a brief sentence or phrase of instructions for users, telling them to click a button to upload the description file. 如果這個屬性，或指派自訂文字屬性，文字應該進行清除使用者上傳的描述檔案。If you assign custom text to this property, or to the property, the text should make clear that the user is uploading a description file. 文字不應該假設，或暗示上傳程序實際上控制項本身上傳。The text should not say or imply that the upload process is actually uploading the control itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property declaratively and programmatically. 如完整的程式碼和指示，才能執行此範例中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code and instructions required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在下列程式碼區段中，請注意，控制項以宣告方式設定屬性值。In the following section of code, notice that the property value is set declaratively for the control.
